title: These Casually Cool Suede Hobo Bags Are Already Dominating 2025
excerpt: Looking for the answer to creating an effortlessly cool wardrobe in mere seconds? Throw on a chic suede hobo bag as your finishing touch. You can’t go wrong.
text: The It Girl-Approved BagCoach Brooklyn Shoulder Bag 39As mentioned before, this bag has been seen on the likes of Bella Hadid along with many a fashion editor. Combine that with the fact that it’ll sit comfortably on your shoulder and carry all of the essentials and then some.Dimensions: Height: 17 inches; width: 15.25 inches; depth: 4.75 inchesColors: 7 optionsMaterial: Suede, grain leatherThe Faux Suede OptionJ.W. html:
The It Girl-Approved Bag

Coach Brooklyn Shoulder Bag 39

As mentioned before, this bag has been seen on the likes of Bella Hadid along with many a fashion editor. Combine that with the fact that it’ll sit comfortably on your shoulder and carry all of the essentials and then some.

Dimensions: Height: 17 inches; width: 15.25 inches; depth: 4.75 inches

Colors: 7 options

Material: Suede, grain leather

The Faux Suede Option

J.W. Pei Dara Faux Suede Hobo Bag

Perhaps genuine suede isn’t your thing. No worries, cool girl-approved brand J.W. Pei has this beautiful piece—and for under $100, no less.

Dimensions: Height: 19.69 inches; width: 15.16 inches; depth: 3.15 inches

Colors: Black, Mocha Brown, Dark Olive, Yellowish Brown

Material: Faux suede, polyester

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Elevated Tote

Madewell The Essential Curve Shoulder Bag

Looking for an upgrade to your everyday bag? This bestselling option from Madewell can hold your keys, phone, a planner, and more without sacrificing style. And it comes in several colors to fit every preference.

Dimensions: Height: 11.5 inches; width: 10 inches

Colors: 8 options

Materials: 100 percent leather

The Street Style Must-Have

Bottega Veneta Large Hop

I simply couldn’t leave this gorgeous Bottega number out of the mix now, could I? One look at this oversized bag and you just know that suede is going to make you (and everyone else) weak in the knees.

Dimensions: Height: 9.4 inches; width: 21.3 inches; depth: 5.1 inches

Colors: Fondant, Olive Oil

Material: Calfskin

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Effortlessly Cool Moment

Reformation Medium Vittoria Tote Bag

Personally speaking, I can never say no to a larger bag. Reformation’s Vittoria Medium Tote feels like the Goldilocks of slouchy totes, holding a sizeable amount of your things (but not so much that you weigh yourself down).

Dimensions: Height: 9.5 inches; width: 5 inches; depth: 12 inches

Colors: 8 options

Material: Calf suede

The Best Designer Hobo

Saint Laurent Le 5 À 7 Hobo Bag

This may be one of the most iconic designer hobo bags to grace the world with its presence. Between the trend-proof design and the rich suede material, I promise you this is well be worth the investment, which is why I dubbed it one of the best designer bags you can get right now.

Dimensions: Height: 14.5 inches; width: 10.5 inches; depth: 5.25 inches

Colors: Caramel Cognac

Material: Suede

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Editor Favorite

Toteme Belted Suede Tote Bag

If you’re asking me or any of my fashion-forward colleagues, we can never get enough Toteme in our wardrobes. Whether it be for the classic silhouettes and the minimalist aesthetic or the luxe quality, there’s no going wrong here.

Dimensions: Height: 14.5 inches; width: 20.5 inches; depth: 10.5 inches

Colors: Granite

Material: Leather

The Timeless Shoulder Hobo

Nakedvice Renee Bag

For a cute suede hobo bag that won’t be too much of a splurge, I recommend this beautiful option from Nakedvice. And with this sleek and simple silhouette, I guarantee you’ll have this in your wardrobe for a while.

Dimensions: Height: 9.5 inches; width: 14.75 inches; depth: 4.5 inches

Colors: Sand/Silver, Chocolate/Silver

Material: Suede

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Sandy Beige Hobo Tote

Staud Perry Bag

If you love Staud’s Wally Bag, there’s no doubt you’ll want to obsess over the brand’s Perry design. Think of it as the Wally’s big sister, complete with a larger, boxier shape that will look as good as your work tote as it will as your Sunday brunch bag.

Dimensions: Height: 13.5 inches; width: 17 inches; depth: 5.5 inches

Colors: Dune Suede, Black, Tan Suede

Material: Cow leather

The Playful Take

Liffner Pillow Hobo Suede

As someone who owns a bag from Liffner, I can confidently say that the brand knows exactly what it’s doing with its suede pieces. This particular style has been a bestseller—and would you just look at the penne-shaped hardware?!

Dimensions: Height: 14.6 inches; width: 17.3 inches; depth: 3.9 inches

Colors: Dark Brown

Material: Suede

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Boho-Chic Style

Chloé Marcie Tote

Due to their slouchy nature, hobo bags have always been somewhat associated with the boho-chic aesthetic—and really, what designer could do that any better than Chloé?

Dimensions: Height: 11.5 inches; width: 14.25 inches; depth: 4 inches

Colors: Tan

Material: Calfskin

The Unconventional Shoulder Hobo

Flattered Alva Big Bag

If you haven’t been introduced to the brand Flattered yet, it’s time to get acquainted, starting with the Alva. I can already see this going everywhere with you for those weekend getaways.

Dimensions: Height: 11 inches; width: 17.5 inches; depth: 2 inches

Colors: Suede Sand

Material: Suede, twill

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Daily Carry

Mansur Gavriel Everyday Cabas Suede Hobo Bag

Another beautifully slouchy option, this style from Mansur Gavriel, as the name suggests, is meant to be your daily carry. And if the quality is the same as we found in the brand’s iconic Bucket Bag, then you know it’s going to be good.

Dimensions: Height: 13.25 inches; width: 10.25 inches; depth: 6.75 inches

Colors: Cuoio

Material: Leather

The Weekend Pick

The Row Bindle Small Suede Tote Bag

If The Row’s iconic Margaux bag could be considered the fashion-forward woman’s go-to work bag, consider the Bindle her weekend carry.

Dimensions: Height: 11.5 inches; width: 12 inches

Colors: Espresso Ans

Material: Leather suede

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Date Night Go-To

Khaite Medium Olivia Hobo

A hobo bag that feels reminiscent of a chic crescent bag? Sign me up! Let the Olivia Hobo be your evening bag for your next night out at drinks.

Dimensions: Height: 9.4 inches; width: 16 inches; depth: 7 inches

Colors: 12 options

Material: Suede

The Pop of Red

Free People Roma Suede Tote Bag

Let me make one thing abundantly clear: A pop of red isn’t going anywhere! And in an eye-catching shade like this one, it’s the perfect way to brighten up your winter looks.

Dimensions: Shoulder drop: 13.8 inches; width: 16.5 inches; depth: 4.3 inches

Colors: Garnet, Coconut Shell, Rust, Black, Olive Moss

Material: Suede, cotton

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Why Trust ELLE
